alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:48PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sherman County through 615 PM MDT... At 547 PM MDT, Doppler radar was thunderstorm outflow 4 miles north of Goodland, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Goodland around 555 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 12 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for northwestern and west central Kansas.
